EmailTemplate.name: Sweeter Than Most
EmailTemplate.subject: You Just Hit The Jackpot My Friend.......
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Howdy {!Order.Customer_Name__c},
You just chose to indulge in our sweetest treats and your order #: {!Order.OrderNumber} has been {!Order.Status}. You wont regret the journey you are about to embark on, we'll have it ready for you on {!Order.EndDate}.
Enjoy,
{!Order.Order_Location__c}
